articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 games and accessories at Amazon, plus a hidden spot to buy the console
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 launched on June 5 with a retail price starting at $449.99, and was immediately sold out at major retailers like Walmart, Target, Sam's Club and GameStop. A bundle including Mario Kart World was also released for $499.99. Most original Nintendo Switch games and accessories work on the new Switch 2.

articles.title: Sunshinegun expands offering with full-service digital capability
articles.summary: Sunshinegun has expanded its service offerings to include a full-service digital capability, integrating creative, UX, design, and development. This new capability focuses on delivering purposeful digital experiences, tools, and interfaces. The agency aims to build digital tools and environments that support brand ideas in action.

articles.title: A popular virtual food just opened another N.J. location. More are on the way.
articles.author: Lauren Musni
articles.summary: Wonder, a virtual food hall startup, expanded its presence by opening its first location in Middlesex County, Woodbridge, NJ on June 5. The location offers delivery and pickup from multiple restaurant brands, including those owned by celebrity chefs. This expands Wonder's footprint to 16 locations in New Jersey, and approximately 50 locations along the East Coast.

articles.title: Walmart Taps Walton Goggins to Prove It Sells More Than You Think
articles.author: Lauren Johnson
articles.summary: Walmart launched a new ad campaign, 'Walmart. Who knew?', featuring actor Walton Goggins, to showcase its extensive and unexpected product range. The campaign also highlights Walmart's expansion of its services through investments in its third-party marketplace, Walmart+ loyalty program, and technology like generative AI and augmented reality.

articles.title: 33 Quick And Easy Fixes For Home Issues That Irk You
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The content introduces a range of new home improvement and cleaning products designed to solve common household problems. These include items like a WD-40 pen for easy fixes, mold and mildew remover gel, a vacuum stand for Dyson vacuums, and magnetic motion sensor lights for lighting upgrades.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney's Bathwater Soap Sells Out
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney collaborated with Dr. Squatch to launch a new bar of soap. The product incorporates a 'splash' of her bathwater, which was an idea pitched by Sweeney herself based on leftover suds from a previous campaign.

articles.title: Trail Catholic School gym turns into marketplace of young minds
articles.author: Sheri Regnier
articles.summary: Kyran and Easton introduced 'Yap Stick' lip balm in strawberry, mint, and watermelon flavors. Mila launched 'Bahamas Beach Body Scrub' with a tropical mix. Silas opened 'Bookmark n' Paint Shop' for personalized bookmarks. Mark and Alex presented 'Fidgets and Fridge Magnets,' 3D-printed for stress relief.

articles.title: ALDI To Open New Long Island Store
articles.author: Michael De Santis
articles.summary: ALDI will open a new store in Medford on June 12, offering fresh produce, organic meats, sustainable seafood, and grocery delivery. The first 100 customers will receive a gift bag and a chance to win a $500 gift card. The opening is part of ALDI's plan to open 800 stores nationwide by 2028.

articles.title: This coveted Dyson hair dryer just got a rare $100 price cut, but you'll need to act fast
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $100 discount on select colors of its Supersonic Hair Dryer, reducing the price from $430 to $330 for a limited time. The Prussian Blue/Rich Copper model, which includes five attachments and claims to reduce frizz and flyaways, is currently discounted. The Dyson V12 cordless vacuum is also mentioned for its ease of use and superior cleaning power.

articles.title: Haier's Strategic Partnership with Roland-Garros Enters Third Year, Driving Shared Values of Excellence  Jun. 6, 2025 19:42
articles.summary: Haier continues to introduce new products and solutions in the European market. The Langjing X11 washing machine offers 60% energy savings compared to European A-class standards and has premium pricing. Haier also introduced a smart air solution with simplified installation to meet the local needs in the European market where air conditioner penetration remains below 5%.

articles.title: Dyson extended its sale on the V8 Absolute cordless vacuum - save $170 before it ends
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a deal on the Dyson V8 Absolute cordless vacuum for $349.99, originally $519.99. The Dyson V8 Absolute is engineered to clean all floor types with swappable heads. The vacuum comes with several tools and accessories and offers up to 40 minutes of run time.

articles.title: Prime Day is in July, but you can score these Amazon deals over 50% off right now
articles.author: Madison San Miguel
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a deal on the newest model of the Amazon Echo Buds, featuring crisp sound and effective noise cancellation. Medicube is introducing the Zero Pore Pads 2.0, rated No. 1 in their category, designed to improve pore size and reduce sebum production. A brush-style hair straightener is also being introduced, promising to straighten all hair types with minimal heat and damage.

articles.title: The Customization Revolution: Why 3D Printers and Lasers Are Rewriting E-Commerce
articles.author: Jacob Wolinsky
articles.summary: The article highlights how companies like Glowforge, Prusa, ACME Laser, and FLUX are providing tools and services that enable personalized product creation. Glowforge offers options for custom signs and gifts, Prusa provides 3D printers for prototypes, ACME Laser builds retail lasers, and FLUX's Beam Studio offers design tools for direct machine use. Additionally, Shapeways provides a platform for producing and shipping custom goods on behalf of sellers.

articles.title: The Founder of Drybar Just Launched an Anti-Blowout Line of Products
articles.author: Kara Mcgrath
articles.summary: Webb designed and launched a new styling cream called Messy Rough Dry Cream, intended to complement a finger-twisting styling technique. The cream was tested on various hair types, with users with ringlets and coils mixing it with overnight serum for added hydration. Initial reviews from testers with finer hair and looser curl patterns were mixed, showing both benefits and drawbacks compared to existing products.

articles.title: Exciting News: Cavendish Farms' Quick Crisp® Wins at the 32nd Annual Canadian Grand Prix New Product Awards!
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: The Quick Crisp® line of frozen potato and appetizer products by an unnamed company received the Canadian Grand Prix New Product Award, recognizing innovation and quality in the Canadian food market. The award demonstrates the unnamed company's commitment to delivering exceptional products to Canadian consumers.

articles.title: Early Access Alexa+: I tested Amazon's AI assistant. Here's why it's a game-changer
articles.author: Jason St. Angelo
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Early Access program for its new AI-infused Alexa+ service, an enhanced version of Alexa. This new service offers improved AI capabilities, including handling complex tasks like menu planning and restaurant reservations. The service requires user engagement to realize its full potential, offering more accurate and pleasant interactions.

articles.title: Under $25 scores: AmazerBath Lotion Applicator
articles.author: Michelle Rae Uy
articles.summary: The AmazerBath Lotion Applicator is a new product designed for easy application of sunscreen to hard-to-reach areas, particularly the back. The applicator features a long, curved handle, a rubber grip, and washable pads, offering an alternative to needing assistance from others and ensuring even sunscreen distribution.

articles.title: Shopee Celebrates SG60 with Flag Distribution, Community Support and Locally Designed Merchandise
articles.summary: Shopee is launching a limited-edition SG60-themed merchandise collection to commemorate Singapore's 60th National Day. The collection features winning designs from Mediacorp's Design Pompipi competition, brought to life on products by Holistic Way, Ocean Health, Biofinest, New Moon, and Ebene, and is available from 1 July 2025 on the Shopee app.

articles.title: M&S unveils new twist on classic dessert but shoppers point out 'missing' element
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: M&S (Marks and Spencer) has introduced a new dessert called 'Victoria Sponge Cheese-Cake,' a twist on the classic cheesecake, blending a strawberry cheesecake topping with a Victoria sponge base instead of the traditional biscuit base. The dessert is available in M&S stores and on the Ocado website for £6.

articles.title: New Era in Digital Delivery: Integrated Hybrid App, Web Design, and Software Testing Services Now Available
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: A new comprehensive service suite offering integrated hybrid app design services, web design and development services, and software testing and quality assurance is launched. The hybrid app design services focus on creating high-performing, responsive applications and web design and development services deliver dynamic, scalable digital products. The service also includes a robust software testing and quality assurance program which includes manual and automated testing.

articles.title: Aldi launches last minute emergency gift service for Father's Day shoppers in Greater Manchester
articles.author: Emily OBrien
articles.summary: Aldi launched an 'SOS Service' gift box for Father's Day shoppers in Greater Manchester. The gift boxes contain a card, Moser Roth chocolate, and Aldi-themed socks. Shoppers can email to receive a box on a first-come, first-served basis.

articles.title: Microsoft integrates AI shopping into Copilot app, bringing price tracking and smart comparisons
articles.author: Livemint
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched Copilot Shopping, an AI-enhanced shopping experience built into its Copilot app for web and mobile users. Copilot Shopping allows users to explore items based on natural language queries, track prices, view consumer reviews, and complete purchases within the app. The tool also displays the historical price range of a product and allows users to set a preferred purchase price.

articles.title: McDonald's Stock Gets a Downgrade. Why Chicken Strips Are to Blame.
articles.author: Nate Wolf
articles.summary: A fast-food giant introduced new chicken strips. An analyst notes the new strips have less breading and appear smaller compared to previous versions.

articles.title: Sprouts Sets Opening Date For North Oak Cliff Store
articles.author: Lauren Drewes Daniels
articles.summary: Sprouts, an Arizona-based grocer, is opening a new store on June 20th at 1322 N. Hampton Road, North Texas. The grand opening will include activities, tastings, family events, and special promotions like goodie bags for the first shoppers and a 20% discount for app users.

articles.title: Shoppers rave about Next's comfortable £38 summer dress, perfect for both day and evening wear
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next introduced the Jersey Waisted Summer Dress, priced at £38 and available in four colors.  The dress boasts a comfortable fit, soft jersey fabric, a stylish square neckline, side pockets, and is designed for both day and evening wear.  Customers have given the dress positive reviews.

articles.title: TikTok needs to start acting like the food retailer it now is
articles.author: Adam Leyland
articles.summary: Oaf has launched a new bread brand targeting the gluten-free sector. This introduction aims to address the lack of innovation in gluten-free options, contrasting with the increasing availability of lactose-free products in supermarkets.

articles.title: You.com seeking $1.4bn valuation in new funding round
articles.author: Global Data
articles.summary: You.com is enhancing its AI assistant offerings and expanding into the enterprise market, providing AI tools and APIs. They offer a premium plan priced at $15 per month, providing access to AI models and productivity features. This strategic move allows organizations to enhance employee productivity and explore new revenue opportunities.

articles.title: Why I recommend this Motorola over flagship phones that cost twice as much
articles.author: Cesar Cadenas
articles.summary: Motorola has released the Motorola Edge, a midrange phone featuring an improved pOLED display with Super HD resolution and 4,500 nits of peak brightness. The phone also includes Dolby Atmos stereo speakers for enhanced audio and a long lasting battery. The new 2025 Edge has a lower refresh rate of 120Hz instead of 144Hz of previous model.

articles.title: The Friday Checkout: Can Amazon Fresh ring up success with its arsenal of low prices?
articles.author: Grocery Dive Staff
articles.summary: Amazon Fresh is implementing a strategy of low prices to attract grocery shoppers. Lidl has updated the schedule for its 'Midl of Lidl' displays, offering new products every Monday. Circana acquired NCSolutions to enhance its advertising services, and DeCicco & Sons is adding Simbe's shelf-scanning robots to improve product availability and inventory management.

articles.title: 10 Game-Changing Gadget Gifts Your Dad Will Actually Love And Use
articles.author: Dominique Fluker
articles.summary: Meta offers sunglasses that capture photos and videos, play music, and enable hands-free calls and AI assistance on the go. The sunglass is equipped with Meta AI, creating a seamless user experience.

articles.title: 'Next are really upping their game' - shoppers rave over summer dress that 'flatters the figure'
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Next is offering a new puff sleeve midi dress in five different colors (khaki, teal, white floral, yellow, and pink floral), priced between £52-£56. The dress features a shirred waist detailing and airy midi length, made from a cotton and viscose blend, machine washable. Shoppers have responded positively to the dress, with some buying it in multiple colors.

articles.title: Brits ditching pressure washers for 'game-changing' patio cleaner
articles.author: Laura Mckenna Audience Writer
articles.summary: Several outdoor cleaning products are highlighted, including Wet and Forget, Spear and Jackson's Spray and Leave, and Sodium Hypochlorite Patio Cleaner, which are available on Amazon. The Wet and Forget Outdoor Cleaning Solution is particularly noted for its positive customer reviews. Additionally, the Electric Weed Sweeper from Wowcher and the Yard Force LW CPC1 Cordless Patio Cleaner are mentioned as options for consumers.

articles.title: 'Game-changing' £25 patio cleaner sees Brits ditching pressure washers
articles.author: Laura Mckenna
articles.summary: Wet and Forget Outdoor Cleaning Solution, a budget-friendly alternative to jet washers, is gaining popularity on Amazon with a 26% discount. This cleaning solution is praised for its easy application and effectiveness on patios, decking, fences, and walls. Spear and Jackson's Spray and Leave and Sodium Hypochlorite Patio Cleaner are also mentioned as alternative cleaning solutions available on Amazon.

articles.title: Here are the biggest Nintendo Switch 2 launch games you can buy
articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5th along with a variety of games, including both first-party and third-party titles. Details about prices, install sizes, and the availability format (cartridge or Game-Key Card) are provided for these games.

articles.title: Want to buy a Nintendo Switch 2? Ask yourself these questions first
articles.author: Todd Martens
articles.summary: Nintendo released the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5. The product faces scrutiny regarding its cost and the purchasing process.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 available online at Target: Release date, price and key features
articles.author: Bhavika Rathore
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Switch 2, a new generation console, available online at Target, Sam's Club, and StockX since June 5. Priced at $449.99, it features a larger 1080p display, supports 4K output, and includes magnetic Joy-Con 2 controllers, a built-in camera, and backward compatibility with original Switch games.

articles.title: How to buy refurbished tech from Apple, Amazon and more
articles.author: Harry Rabinowitz
articles.summary: Apple offers certified refurbished Apple products which undergo in-house testing and come with a new battery, outer shell, and accessories. Samsung sells older Galaxy smartphones via its Certified Re-Newed program, refurbished in-house with Samsung parts and a one-year warranty. Amazon Renewed features a wide selection of inspected and tested electronics, while eBay offers certified refurbished items with a two-year Allstate SquareTrade warranty.

articles.title: Google Gemini Vercel AI SDK Cheatsheet
articles.summary: Vercel's AI SDK now supports Google's Gemini models. Developers can access Gemini models via the AI SDK using code snippets for both text generation and streaming. This integration allows for features like thinking budgets and thought summaries with models like 'gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20'.

articles.title: Sponsored: Saltzman Switches it up
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 in Canada. Marc Saltzman, a tech expert, is providing information on the new product.

articles.title: You can now pre-order Pokémon Legends: Z-A for the Switch and Switch 2
articles.summary: Nintendo's new game, Pokémon Legends: Z-A, the sequel to Pokémon Legends: Arceus, is now available for pre-order. The digital version can be pre-ordered from Nintendo's website for $60 for Nintendo Switch and $70 for the new Switch 2. The physical version of the game can be pre-ordered from retailers like Walmart and Best Buy for both the Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: Fancy winning over £250 worth of SPF goodies from Hello Sunday? Here's the T&Cs
articles.author: Sarah Bradbury
articles.summary: Hello Sunday is giving away a prize bundle of their products worth £251. The bundle includes The Everyday One Face Moisturiser SPF 50, The One That's a Serum SPF 50 Hydrating and Brightening Vitamin C Serum, The Take-Out One Invisible Sun Stick SPF 30, and several other skincare products, offering potential customers a chance to experience the range.

articles.title: Give your dad his due
articles.author: Martha Uniacke Breen
articles.summary: Home Depot is offering new products like a Stylewell Patio Cooler ($169) and a mini pizza oven kit ($168). Walmart is selling the JBL waterproof speaker ($226-240) and Meta Quest 3S Mixed Reality Headset ($550). Magic Bag offers Camo Hot/Cold Compress ($28) and Field Work Company sells Handstitched leather Wolf Wallet ($80).

articles.title: Manus has kick-started an AI agent boom in China
articles.author: Caiwei Chen
articles.summary: Genspark, led by former Baidu executives Eric Jing and Kay Zhu, launched in April and links small "super agents" through multi-component prompting. The company reports it has over 5 million users and over $36 million in yearly revenue. Flowith, marketed as an "infinite agent", was unveiled in April 2025 at an event hosted by Xiaohongshu.

articles.title: From Guest to Business Owner: Local Entrepreneur Brings Blo Blow Dry Bar to Canton
articles.author: Blo Blow Dry Bar
articles.summary: North America's Original Blow Dry Bar Franchise is debuting in Canton. The franchise is offering a Founders Rate for its Mane Squeeze Membership.

articles.title: From Yiwu to the World: A sock trader goes global with short videos and AI
articles.author: People's Daily Online
articles.summary: Fu Jiangyan utilizes AI to create multilingual videos showcasing her socks, attracting global customers and driving sales.  She updates her video content daily, displaying her range of socks and her modern factory equipment. Her successful adoption of AI tools has enabled her to sell 20 million pairs of socks annually and expand her business.

articles.title: Chrysler Turns 100! Chrysler Brand Shares 1,500-plus 100th Birthday Group Photo Honoring ...
articles.author: Stellantis N.V
articles.summary: Chrysler is celebrating its 100th anniversary with a Century of Innovation sales event in June and a 100th-anniversary line of branded merchandise, including apparel and gifts.  More information about Chrysler’s Century of Innovation is available online.

articles.title: Cows are taking over Mario Kart World
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nintendo released its latest console, the Switch 2, yesterday.  The launch title for the console is Mario Kart World.

articles.title: Pandagbot Launches All-Electric Modular Robotic Lawn Mower at TechXLR8 Asia 2025, Marking Global Expansion
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Pandagbot introduced the Pandag-G1, a fully electric modular robotic mower, at TechXLR8 Asia 2025. This event marked the product's first international appearance and signaled Pandagbot's expansion into global markets. The product is also known as Pandag Commercial Robotic Lawn Mower G1.

articles.title: Pandagbot Launches All-Electric Modular Robotic Lawn Mower at TechXLR8 Asia 2025, Marking Global Expansion
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Pandagbot introduced the Pandag-G1, a fully electric modular robotic mower, at TechXLR8 Asia 2025. The Pandag-G1 is designed for commercial-scale landscaping and features autonomous operation, modular design, and zero direct emissions. Additional seasonal attachments, including snow removal functions, are expected to roll out by Q3 2025.

articles.title: 29 Incredibly Helpful TikTok Products
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream with salicylic acid, glycerin and aloe for exfoliating and hydrating skin. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash, which is a body wash version of the TikTok-famous facial Super Serum and is formulated with niacinamide, collagen peptides, vitamin E, and shea butter. Dae launched Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is a big phone with small phone energy
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thinner and lighter alternative to the S25 Plus, priced at $1,099. The S25 Edge features a 200-megapixel main camera and a 12-megapixel ultrawide camera, along with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 6.7-inch screen. The main differentiator is in the battery life and camera setup as compared to the S25 and S25 plus versions.

articles.title: Voice AI that actually converts: New TTS model boosts sales 15% for major brands
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Rime is introducing Arcana text-to-speech (TTS), a new spoken language model capable of generating diverse voices based on text descriptions. Rime also offers Mist v2 TTS model and eight flagship speakers with unique characteristics, such as Luna, Celeste, Orion, and Ursa, designed for various business applications.

articles.title: Genpact acquires XponentL Data to drive AI-led innovation
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Genpact has acquired XponentL Data to enhance its capabilities in data, AI, and advanced technologies. XponentL provides data strategy, design, and engineering capabilities, as well as industry experience and strategic partnerships, allowing Genpact to improve AI transformation services for clients.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Addresses Bathwater Soap Backlash
articles.author: Ellen Durney
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney collaborated with Dr. Squatch to launch a limited edition bar of soap called 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss,' which is marketed as containing traces of her bathwater.  Sweeney revealed that the product was her idea and addressed the mixed reactions surrounding its launch, focusing on its novelty and ability to encourage men to use better hygiene products.

articles.title: How to use Gemini on Android
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Google's AI Gemini is now available for use on Android phones. The article details how users can access and utilize this new Google AI service on their Android devices.

articles.title: Auto review: Drag-racing the Chevy Blazer EV SS (SS for Super Stylish)
articles.author: Henry Payne
articles.summary: Chevy is launching the 2025 Chevy Blazer EV SS. This new model is significantly different from the previous Chevy SS (Super Sport) driven in 2016.

articles.title: Next's 'very flattering' summer dress is 'lovely to wear' and 'ideal for park picnics'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next has launched the Jersey Waisted Summer Dress, available in multiple colors and sizes, priced at £38. The dress features a soft jersey fabric, square neckline, side pockets, and waist detailing, and is marketed as ideal for summer. Customer reviews are largely positive, praising its comfort, flattering fit, and versatility.

articles.title: Dominos Pizza Introduces all-new Calzone to Nigerian market
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Domino's Pizza Nigeria has launched the Calzone, a new culinary offering, in the Nigerian market. This introduction aims to redefine the quick service restaurant experience for customers.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers 'drool' over new 'absolutely delicious' summer treat
articles.author: Brian Dillon
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced a new tiramisu gelato to its UK stores, priced at £2.49. The gelato, made in Italy, features coffee and Marsala wine. The product has garnered positive attention on social media, with users praising its flavor and quality.

articles.title: This Is How to Secure a Nintendo Switch 2 on Launch Day
articles.author: Josh Rosenberg
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5th. This new video game console is the sequel to Nintendo's most successful home console and is considered a worthy successor with overdue upgrades, making it an all-in-one gaming machine.

articles.title: 1 Million Fans Entered Dr. Squatch's Sydney Sweeney Bathwater Soap Giveaway
articles.author: Rebecca Stewart
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch launched a new soap called 'Bathwater Bliss', infused with purified water after Sydney Sweeney bathed in it. 973,000 people entered a giveaway for the limited-run bars after the product's unveiling on Instagram. The soap is part of a marketing campaign designed to get men to pay closer attention to the brand's natural personal care products.

articles.title: Do We Really Need Home Robots?
articles.author: Tyler Durden
articles.summary: Tesla is developing robots, with Elon Musk claiming they will become the biggest consumer product. These robots are envisioned to perform various household tasks. Prototypes are being developed with impressive AI language models and natural movements.

articles.title: Google vs ChatGPT: Is This the End of Google Search?  Vantage with Palki Sharma
articles.author: Palki Sharma
articles.summary: ChatGPT has reached 365 billion annual searches just two years after its launch, compared to Google's 11 years to reach the same volume. AI tools like ChatGPT are changing how people find information by providing direct answers, potentially impacting traditional search engines like Google.

articles.title: Chinese household appliance producer to open plant in Azerbaijan
articles.author: Sadig Javadov
articles.summary: Youkai, a Chinese company specializing in household cleaning products, intends to open a plant in Azerbaijan. This expansion aims to provide high-quality laundry detergents, kitchen cleaners, and floor cleaning products to the Azerbaijani market. Youkai currently manufactures products for companies such as Unilever and global brands such as FairPrice, Lamb, and Bimax.

articles.title: Samsung A16: New Mid-Range Champion for Pakistan
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A16 in Pakistan, a budget-friendly smartphone priced at Rs. 59,999. The Galaxy A16 features a triple camera system (50MP main, 5MP ultrawide, 2MP depth), a 5000mAh battery, 6.5-inch HD+ display, 8GB of RAM, and 256GB of storage.

articles.title: Ethel Cain and Porter Robinson were day one Switch 2 buyers
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Switch 2 on June 5th. The new Nintendo console quickly garnered significant interest from consumers.

articles.title: 36 Summer Beauty Products Lots Of 5-Star Ratings
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Several beauty product launches are detailed, including L'Oréal Paris BB Cream for redness reduction, Brazilian Bum Bum body cream for hydration, and Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen for sheer sun protection. Other notable products are Ogx Argan Oil of Morocco Curl-Defining Cream for curl definition, Wet n Wild lipstick for affordable color, and Kerasal fungal nail renewal for nail revitalization. Additionally, the list included Revlon's Volcanic Face Roller, Gold Bond's Firming Neck and Chest Cream, Essence Lash Princess Mascara and others.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 launched amid unprecedented global demand: What's new?
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Nintendo has officially launched the Switch 2 console worldwide, featuring a 7.9-inch LCD screen, custom Nvidia Tegra processor, and 256GB of internal storage. The launch lineup includes games like Mario Kart World and The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Switch 2 Edition. The Switch 2 is priced at $449.99 in the US and £395.99 in the UK and pre-orders exceeded 2.2 million in Japan alone.

articles.title: /C O R R E C T I O N -- Meala/
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Meala FoodTech partners with dsm-firmenich to launch Vertis™ PB Pea, a new texturizing pea protein ingredient for meat alternatives. This ingredient is designed to replace modified binders and is now available in Europe through dsm-firmenich. Vertis™ PB Pea is a clean-label texturizer produced using biotechnology, offering multiple benefits such as enhanced nutritional value and allergen-free properties.

articles.title: Microsoft's Surface SE Laptop Just Dropped to $190—and It Even Comes With Windows 11
articles.summary: Microsoft's Surface Laptop SE, originally designed for students, is now available as an open-box deal for $189.99. This compact laptop features an 11.6-inch HD display, Intel Celeron N4120 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, and Windows 11 SE, optimized for performance and simplicity. It also has good connectivity and long battery life.

articles.title: First Look at the Nike Air Max 1000 'Oatmeal'
articles.summary: Nike is launching the Air Max 1000 'Oatmeal' in Summer 2025. The shoe will retail for $210 USD and features an Oatmeal/White-Total Orange colorway (SKU: HV0234-100).

articles.title: Joan Collins' skin secret is a bargain 2-in-1 cleanser that we can't believe is £2 now
articles.summary: Nivea's 2-in-1 Face Cleanser is highlighted for its cleansing and toning capabilities, infused with Vitamin E and Hydramine for hydration. The product is noted for its affordability and effectiveness in streamlining skincare routines, endorsed by Joan Collins and positive customer reviews.

articles.title: Next generation of powerful LG AI TVs is here
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its 2025 TV lineup, featuring OLED evo and QNED evo models with enhanced AI processors and display technology. The new lineup includes features like AI Picture Pro, AI Sound Pro, redesigned AI Magic Remote, and an AI Chatbot for troubleshooting.

articles.title: Shoppers can get 'salon-quality' £30 shampoo for £3.99 at Home Bargains
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Home Bargains introduced the Mizani True Texture Moisture Replenish Shampoo and Conditioner, typically priced at £30, for £3.99 as part of their StarBuy promotion. Home Bargains also featured the 'world's biggest Werther's Original' for £4.99 and car air fresheners for 79p.

articles.title: May in Review: 12 Top Technology Press Releases
articles.summary: XREAL is launching a new see-through optical device. PepsiCo has plans for digital transformation, indicating new service offerings or updates to existing ones.

articles.title: How algorithms are changing the way Filipinos shop
articles.author: Jasper Valdez
articles.summary: Lazada launched its 6.6 Super Wow Sale campaign, emphasizing AI-powered personalization features like LazzieChat to provide tailored product suggestions. The company introduced personalized app layouts and virtual try-ons in fashion, aiming to enhance the shopping experience.

articles.title: Next shoppers snap up £28 midi dress 'perfect for a sunny day'
articles.author: Nadia Breen
articles.summary: Next is offering the Threadbare Cotton Smock Style Midi Dress, priced between £22 and £28, which is available in multiple colors and sizes. This dress is designed for comfort and versatility, suitable for both holidays and everyday wear, and has received positive customer feedback. Other companies like Roman and New Look have similar products like Royal Blue Aztec Print Midi Smock Dress and Black Crinkled Bow Back Smock Midi Dress respectively.

articles.title: Lyman Laundry in Holyoke to celebrate grand opening
articles.author: Ashley Shook
articles.summary: Lyman Laundry is celebrating its grand opening under new ownership with upgrades and redesign. The laundromat offers amenities like vending machines, laundry carts, folding stations, and large-capacity machines. It is open seven days a week and accepts cash, credit, and EBT.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney gives three-word savage response to viral soap query
articles.author: TN Web Desk
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney pitched the idea for "Sydney's Bathwater Bliss," a soap infused with her bathwater. The product was announced on May 29 via a joint Instagram post by Sweeney and the body care brand Dr. Squatch. The announcement received mixed reactions from the internet.

articles.title: Create Ad-Style Product Teasers in CapCut PC with Sound Effects and Cuts
articles.summary: CapCut PC is presented as a tool to create ad-style product teasers using features like sound effects, cuts, and transitions. The software allows users to create engaging and professional teaser videos to promote products, offering features such as text-to-speech, AI video generator, and various editing tools. A step-by-step guide is provided to use the software effectively to enhance product marketing.

articles.title: Nothing's next product isn't another smartphone – and it's coming sooner than you think
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Nothing is launching a new product, the over-ear headphones called Headphone (1), on July 1st in London. This launch coincides with the expected arrival of the Phone (3). Pricing is speculated to be in the mid-range, around $199-$249.

articles.title: Father's Day 2025: Gifts for the dad who has everything
articles.author: Team Lounge
articles.summary: Sony is offering WH-1000XM6 headphones with real-time noise cancellation, priced at ₹34,990. Additionally, AI glasses are available, enabling users to take pictures, listen to audio, make calls, and send messages without using their phones; pricing varies. These products are marketed as potential gifts and are available online and in stores.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Launch Date, Price In India, Design, Camera, Specifications, Latest Leaks: What To Expect Next Week
articles.author: Sparsh Sharma
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Motorola Edge 60 in India on June 10. The phone features a 6.67-inch 1.5K pOLED display, a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset, a 5500 mAh battery with 68W fast charging, and a triple camera setup including a 50-megapixel Sony LYTIA 700C primary sensor. The expected price range is Rs 20,000 to Rs 25,000.

articles.title: Full list of 20 Greggs stores trialling a tasty new food item including North East sites
articles.author: Sonia Sharma
articles.summary: Greggs has launched a trial of new Pulled Pork Sandwiches in 20 stores in the North East. The sandwiches, available in traditional and BBQ variations, can be purchased for £4 and are also part of a hot sandwich deal. Customers can order via Just Eat, Uber Eats, and the Greggs App.

articles.title: Meet ‘Yadom Hong Thai' - the famous Thai herbal inhaler that's making global waves
articles.author: Patiparn Changpoo
articles.summary: Yadom Hong Thai, a popular Thai herbal inhaler brand, recently launched a new design: a long stick-style inhaler for increased convenience. This follows their success with existing formulas and a rounded bottle design, contributing to sales of over 350 million baht in 2024.

articles.title: iQOO to launch Z10 Lite with 6,000 mAh battery on June 18 in India
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: iQOO, led by CEO Nipun Marya, is teasing the imminent launch of a new product, described as a "Lite" version.

articles.title: Galaxy Lockscreens Can Use AI to Show You in Outfits You Might Want to Buy
articles.author: Alex Valdes
articles.summary: Glance AI and Samsung are rolling out an AI shopping experience for Galaxy users. This experience allows users to see themselves in different outfits using AI, with links to purchase them. The app is optional and will be available to all users within 30 days.

articles.title: For members of this new private club from The Laundress founder, cleaning isn't a chore ...
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Gwen Whiting, founder of The Laundress, launched The Fill in 2024. The Fill is a members-only cleaning club focusing on sustainability.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz South Africa Launches Comprehensive 7-Year/140,000 km Service Plan
articles.author: Partnered Content
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz South Africa introduces PremiumDrive Exclusive Care, a new 7-year/140,000 km service and maintenance plan designed to provide long-term peace of mind for Mercedes-Benz owners, and PremiumDrive Comfort Care, a refined version of their existing 5-year service plan. The PremiumDrive Exclusive Care plan includes roadside assistance, mobility services, and stand-by-me services, as well as complimentary tire and rim cover.

articles.title: Kling AI Celebrates First Anniversary; Achieves Annualized Revenue Run Rate Surpassing USD100 Million in 10th Month Since Launch  Jun. 6, 2025 07:02
articles.summary: Kuaishou Technology's Kling AI video generation model achieved significant revenue milestones, surpassing USD100 million in Annualized Revenue Run Rate by March 2025. Following its initial launch, Kuaishou introduced Kling AI 2.0 in April 2025 and debuted the Kling AI 2.1 model series in May 2025, offering enhanced motion performance and cost-effectiveness for users.

articles.title: 26 Products To Make Cleaning So Easy You *Almost* Won't Mind Doing It Anymore
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new or updated cleaning products. It showcases products like Bioclean hard water stain remover, Levoit air purifier, sink cleaner and polish, fume-free oven cleaner, Clorox toilet wand, car vacuum cleaner, Dawn Powerwash dish soap, Bissell Little Green carpet cleaner, Chom Chom pet hair remover, Furemover rubber broom, The Pink Stuff cleaner, Wet & Forget cleaner, Baseboard Buddy, plant-based stainless steel cleaner, Cerama-Bryte cooktop cleaning kit, Bissell CleanView vacuum, Roomba robot vacuum, automatic makeup brush cleaner, microfiber wand, scrubbing attachments, mold & mildew removing gel, deep-cleaning brush duo, Iron Out rust stain remover, microfiber cleaning cloths, Hoover PowerDash carpet-cleaning machine, carpet cleaning and deodorizing solution and Puracy's all-in-one cleaning concentrate. Each product aims to provide improved cleaning solutions for various household needs.

articles.title: Car review: Unrealised potential in the Mini JCW Cooper Convertible
articles.author: Christopher Tan
articles.summary: Mini introduces the JCW Cooper Convertible, a car aimed at boomers, leveraging the Mini brand's vintage appeal. The JCW Cooper Convertible is the best way to enjoy with roof down and music up.

articles.title: Virgin Media will give you a free iPad this weekend - how to claim yours now
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering a free 9th-generation Apple iPad with 64GB storage to new customers who sign up for their 18-month Mega Volt bundle. The bundle includes Gig1 Fibre Broadband, over 230 TV channels via Sky TV, Netflix Standard with ads, and an Unlimited O2 SIM card for £88.99 per month.

articles.title: Fifth Third takes ‘intentionally unsexy' approach to mobile app improvements
articles.author: Caitlin Mullen
articles.summary: Fifth Third Bank is enhancing its mobile banking app with improvements to SmartShield, Zelle integration, and its virtual banking assistant, Jeanie. The bank expects to release substantial developments in these areas within the next six months, focusing on user experience and fraud protection through AI-driven solutions.

articles.title: UK households who buy Nutella face big shake-up 'for first time in 60 years'
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: Ferrero is launching a new Peanut flavor of Nutella for the first time in 60 years, expected to be available from spring 2026. Additionally, Ferrero is introducing Ferrero Rocher chocolate squares in September, featuring varieties like Milk Hazelnut and Dark Hazelnut.

articles.title: The 7 Best Handheld Vacuums We Tested and Researched
articles.author: Amber Joglar
articles.summary: The article highlights handheld vacuums from brands like Black+Decker, Dyson, and Shark, evaluating their features and capabilities for maintaining cleanliness. It focuses on their suitability for small messes, battery life, and voltage, offering recommendations for various needs.

articles.title: HONOR 400 5G launches soon, bringing old memories to life with AI
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines is launching the HONOR 400 5G smartphone in the Philippines on June 17. The phone uses AI technology to animate static photos, offering a new way to revive and experience memories. The launch event will be live on Facebook.

articles.title: GBfoods committed to innovating with quality flavours
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: GBfoods Nigeria has launched five new products: Bama Shawarma Mix, Gino Asun-Flavoured Seasoning Cubes, Gino Asun-Flavoured Tomato Mix, Gino Red Hot Pepper Powder, and Jago Mayonnaise (re-launched). These products aim to bring convenience, quality, and affordability to home cooks, chefs, food entrepreneurs and consumers.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour Review
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo announced Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour as a launch title for the Nintendo Switch 2. The game offers players a tour of the Switch 2 hardware through mini-game exhibits, functioning as a playable instruction manual.

articles.title: Generative Artificial Intelligence and the Future of Marketing
articles.author: www.ETBrand Equity.com
articles.summary: Amazon launched Rufus, a Gen AI-powered shopping assistant that offers personalized recommendations and product comparisons. Mondelez introduced 'My Cadbury Era', a campaign allowing users to generate personalized vintage posters using selfies and selected ad eras.  Wavye.ai is also set to roll out a fleet of self-driving vehicles in collaboration with Uber Eats by 2025.

articles.title: 32 Outdoor Essentials For Summer
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Burt's Bees introduced an After Sun soother formulated with aloe and coconut oil. Naturium launched a cooling gel body wash infused with mandelic acid. Neutrogena released an oil-free sunscreen body mist with SPF 70. Liquid I.V. launched Firecracker-flavored electrolyte drink mix.

articles.title: Next-Gen Mahindra Bolero Spotted Testing in India
articles.author: Ayush Arya
articles.summary: Mahindra is road-testing a prototype of the next-generation Mahindra Bolero in India, with a concept reveal expected on August 15, 2025. The updated SUV features a redesigned exterior, new features like flush-fitting door handles and larger alloy wheels, and is built on Mahindra's New Flexible Architecture (NFA) platform supporting various powertrains.

articles.title: FDA Approves Lab-Grown Salmon For Consumption
articles.author: The Wine Press
articles.summary: Wildtype is set to launch its cultivated salmon in the US, starting with the Kann restaurant in Portland in June, after securing FDA approval. The company received a letter from the FDA stating they had no further safety concerns and is the fourth company to complete the consultation process. This cultivated seafood is now approved for sale.

articles.title: 39 Random Items To Buy If You Enjoy Spoiling Yourself
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash, infused with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides, delivering 24-hour hydration. Dossier launched "Ambery Vanilla" perfume as an alternative to YSL's Black Opium. E.l.f. released Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops, a skincare item packed with hibiscus complex and hyaluronic acid.

articles.title: 'What's the point of paying for a subscription?': You'll see AI-generated ads on Netflix by 2026, company says
articles.author: Nina Hernandez
articles.summary: Netflix is set to introduce AI-generated ads in 2026, designed to match the show or movie being watched. These ads will appear as midroll ads or during pause breaks and will roll out to all countries with the ad-supported tier. Amy Reinhard, president of advertising, announced the introduction of AI advertisements in Netflix's second annual upfront to advertisers.

articles.title: R/GA Establishes Global AI Products Team Led by Ben Cooper
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: R/GA has established a dedicated global AI Products team led by Ben Cooper, to help brands with custom AI-powered solutions. Supported by a $50M Innovation Fund, the team delivers bespoke products, tools, blueprints, and accelerators. R/GA's offerings include the AI Search Optimization Platform (AISOP), predictive personalization, generative interfaces, and brand design tools.

articles.title: We handed this straightener to 3 women with very different hair and the results are in.
articles.author: Keeley Mercieca
articles.summary: ghd launched the Chronos Max Wide Plate Hair Straightener, featuring 85% larger plates and 24% thinner edges for faster and more effective styling. The straightener uses high-definition technology to provide ultra-smooth, frizz-free results that last 24 hours, while maintaining an optimal temperature of 185 degrees Celsius to protect hair. It's currently on sale with a 15% discount until June 30th.

articles.title: 23 Kinda Embarrassing Products You Can Order Online
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Several new personal care products are introduced: cold sore healing patches, anti-bacterial butt acne-clearing lotion, an after-sex sponge for cleanup, aluminum-free deodorant wipes, corn remover pads, callus-removing gel, silicone Kegel weights, ear-washing bottle, stainless-steel tongue scrapers, dandruff shampoo, stainless-steel toenail clipper, incontinence pads and underwear, underarm shields, antifungal tea tree balm, nose wax kit, hemorrhoid cream, bra liners, fungal nail renewal formula, Gas-X chewables, deodorizer shoe spray, and wart-removing pads. These products address concerns such as skin healing, acne treatment, hygiene, odor control, foot care, pelvic health, ear and tongue cleaning, dandruff, nail care, incontinence, sweat prevention, fungal infections, hair removal, hemorrhoid relief, boob sweat, gas relief, and shoe odor.

articles.title: Google's new AI-powered search has arrived. Proceed with caution
articles.author: Brian X. Chen
articles.summary: Google is rolling out a new AI Mode worldwide, which is similar to chatbots and will appear as a tab next to Google.com search results. AI Mode aims to provide more specific and complex answers by stitching together data from Google's various Internet services. Testing revealed AI Mode is useful for tasks like product research, generating charts to compare items like car seats.

articles.title: Aging Gracefully Fair in Durham
articles.summary: Aldi showcased new roles at the Bolton Careers Fair.

articles.title: Transformative opportunities for MNCs
articles.summary: Skechers plans to launch functional products incorporating Chinese cultural elements to capitalize on the rise of "Chinese tourism" and "shopping in China". They will also develop a new "Our Planet Matters" collection to align with sustainability trends. Offline stores are introducing immersive experience zones to enhance experiential consumption and strengthen user loyalty.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Reveals She ‘Pitched' The Idea For Her Bathwater Soap
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch collaborated with a person to launch Sydney's Bathwater Bliss. This new soap product is made from her bathwater.

articles.title: How To Add Friends On Switch 2
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 provides a seamless transition from the original Switch with a similar interface. Nintendo is offering a data transfer option, allowing users to easily transfer their data.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s Comes With Lifetime Display Replacement Offer: Why Does It Matter?
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: OnePlus is offering a lifetime warranty on the display of its phones, including the newly launched OnePlus 13s model. This indicates a new service offering related to a specific product launch.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 setup guide
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 console. The setup process involves connecting the dock and transferring data from the old Switch to the new Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: AT&T's New Senior Mobile Plan Offers Big Discounts -- and Sorry, 55 Counts as a 'Senior'
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: AT&T introduced a new, cheaper plan for customers 55 years and older. This plan is available nationwide in the US.

articles.title: Amazon to invest over US$5 billion in new AWS region in Taiwan
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Amazon announced the launch of the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Asia Pacific (Taipei) Region.

articles.title: Your 5 most burning questions about the new Nintendo Switch 2, answered
articles.author: The Brunswick News
articles.summary: Nintendo has released its new console, the Nintendo Switch 2. Retailers opened their doors at midnight to welcome early adopters and fans.

articles.title: Chamber celebrates new owners at N7 Service and Supply
articles.summary: N7 Service and Supply, under new ownership by Shane and Susan Nolf, continues to offer best-in-class products and services in the facilities space. Located in Crawfordsville, the company focuses on building customer trust and delivering on its promises.

articles.title: You Don't Have To Transfer Your System Data To The Switch 2 Right Away
articles.author: Ollie Barder
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Switch 2, featuring a new virtual card setup for game sharing and increased base storage. A new Pro controller has also been released for the Switch 2 with improved features. Users can share games from old Switch via the new virtual card setup.

articles.title: Agfa Launches Three New Digital Photo Products All Ready For A Summer Of Fun
articles.author: Mark Sparrow
articles.summary: Agfa has launched three new products: the Realkids Cam Waterproof 2, a waterproof camera for kids; the Realmove MC3X, a mini gimbal camera for video recording; and the Realipix Mini P.2, a portable photo printer. All three products are currently available for purchase at different prices.

articles.title: 'What's the point of paying for a subscription?': You'll see AI-generated ads on Netflix by ...
articles.author: The Daily Dot
articles.summary: Netflix is planning to introduce AI-generated ads starting in 2026. These ads are designed to match the show or movie being watched. This initiative builds upon Netflix's previous introduction of an ad-supported subscription tier.

articles.title: Hey Dude is having a summer sneaker sale — and you can save an extra ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Hey Dude is promoting their sneakers with a discount, encouraging customers to purchase them before summer.

articles.title: Share a selfie of yourself using Switch 2 GameChat and win Nintendo Lego
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 console. Nintendo partnered for a prize giveaway to celebrate the launch.

articles.title: HOW:TO poll asks if small businesses are getting the support they need
articles.author: Stuff
articles.summary: HOW:TO was launched in October last year on Stuff and on a standalone platform powered by ANZ. This introduction seeks to assess its performance.

articles.title: Zelda Notes breathes new life into Tears of the Kingdom
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2 and a companion app called Zelda Notes. The app introduces new features for existing Switch titles, including The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom and Breath of the Wild. The companion app was first announced in April.

articles.title: Anthropic releases custom AI chatbot for classified spy work
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: Anthropic released 'Claude Gov' AI models specifically designed for US national security clients on Thursday. These custom models address operations including strategic planning, intelligence analysis, and operational support, built based on feedback from government clients.

articles.title: Walmart and Wing Announce Major Drone Delivery Expansion
articles.author: Drone Life
articles.summary: Walmart is partnering to introduce drone delivery services to millions of U.S. households in major metro areas. This collaboration aims to expand access to convenient and efficient delivery options for customers.

articles.title: Clariant launches a new generation of PFAS-free polymer processing aids
articles.author: Hydrocarbon Engineering
articles.summary: Clariant launched a new generation product.

articles.title: Missed out on a Nintendo Switch 2? Here's why the original Switch console might still ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2 this week. The company has stated that their current hybrid system still has life.

articles.title: The Switch 2 Launch Brings up the Question of Demand vs Supply Once More
articles.author: Technowize Magazine
articles.summary: Nintendo's launch of the Switch 2 has generated considerable interest and is reshaping the approach to introducing new gaming devices to the market. The conversation surrounding the Switch 2 has reached unprecedented levels even prior to its formal release.
